name: Heavenly Tea Leaf: Earl Grey
text: Once per turn, change the name of 1 "Heavenly Tea Leaf" card to "Heavenly Tea Leaf: Proxy. If you control "Bryant, Bryant of Bryant": Once per turn, your opponent must declare that they are, in fact, "Having a Bryant Moment right now" in chat. If they do not declare this, they lose the match, and forfeit all other future matches, until the end of the tournament.
